metadata.note: Preparation times are randomized and may vary based on individual experience

foundational.title: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
foundational.description: Validates foundational knowledge of AWS Cloud concepts, services, and terminology. Ideal for individuals new to cloud computing with no prior AWS experience.

foundational.title: AWS Certified AI Practitioner
foundational.description: Demonstrates foundational AI and machine learning knowledge on AWS. Validates understanding of AI services and their business applications.

associate.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate
associate.description: Demonstrates the ability to design distributed systems on AWS. Validates skills in designing available, cost-efficient, fault-tolerant, and scalable distributed systems.
associate.prerequisites: 1 year of experience designing distributed systems

associate.title: AWS Certified Developer – Associate
associate.description: Validates proficiency in developing, deploying, and debugging cloud-based applications using AWS. Tests knowledge of core AWS services, uses, and basic architecture best practices.
associate.prerequisites: 1 year of experience developing applications on AWS

associate.title: AWS Certified CloudOps Engineer – Associate
associate.description: Validates skills in deploying, managing, and operating workloads on AWS. Demonstrates expertise in AWS operational excellence and cloud infrastructure management.
associate.prerequisites: 1 year of experience in AWS operations

associate.title: AWS Certified Data Engineer – Associate
associate.description: Showcases the ability to design data models, manage data lifecycles, and ensure data quality. Validates expertise in implementing data pipelines and analytics solutions.

professional.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Professional
professional.description: Validates advanced technical skills and experience in designing distributed applications and systems on AWS. Demonstrates expertise in complex, multi-tier architectures.
professional.prerequisites: 2+ years of hands-on experience designing and deploying cloud architecture on AWS

professional.title: AWS Certified DevOps Engineer – Professional
professional.description: Demonstrates expertise in provisioning, operating, and managing distributed application systems on AWS. Validates advanced skills in continuous delivery and automation.
professional.prerequisites: 2+ years of experience in provisioning, operating, and managing AWS environments

specialty.title: AWS Certified Advanced Networking – Specialty
specialty.description: Validates expertise in designing and maintaining network architecture for the breadth of AWS services. Demonstrates complex networking skills for hybrid and multi-account environments.
specialty.prerequisites: 5 years of hands-on experience architecting and implementing network solutions

specialty.title: AWS Certified Security – Specialty
specialty.description: Demonstrates knowledge of securing data and workloads in the AWS Cloud. Validates expertise in incident response, logging, and compliance frameworks.
specialty.prerequisites: 2+ years of hands-on experience securing AWS workloads

specialty.title: AWS Certified Machine Learning – Specialty
specialty.description: Validates the ability to design, implement, deploy, and maintain machine learning solutions on AWS. Demonstrates expertise in data engineering, exploratory data analysis, and model training.
specialty.prerequisites: 1-2 years of experience developing, architecting, or running ML workloads on AWS

specialty.title: AWS Certified Data Analytics – Specialty
specialty.description: Demonstrates expertise in using AWS data lakes and analytics services to get insights from data. Validates skills in designing and maintaining analytics solutions.
specialty.prerequisites: 5 years of experience with data analytics technologies and 2 years with AWS

specialty.title: AWS Certified Database – Specialty
specialty.description: Validates expertise in recommending, designing, and maintaining optimal AWS database solutions. Demonstrates knowledge of database migration, backup, and performance optimization.
specialty.prerequisites: 5 years of experience with database technologies and 2 years with AWS

specialty.title: AWS Certified SAP on AWS – Specialty
specialty.description: Demonstrates expertise in designing, implementing, migrating, and operating SAP workloads on AWS. Validates knowledge of SAP architecture and AWS infrastructure integration.
specialty.prerequisites: Experience with SAP solutions and AWS infrastructure

specialty.title: AWS Certified Alexa Skill Builder – Specialty
specialty.description: Demonstrates expertise in building, testing, and publishing Amazon Alexa skills. Validates knowledge of voice user interface design and Alexa Skills Kit.
